Insightful data designed
for Ship Management / Boost ship management productivity

Voyager FLEET INSIGHT transform your fleet operations with data-led solutions that enhance the way you manage navigation compliance and costs online.

Request free trial Watch the video
Enhance compliance
Improve control
Reduce costs

Track every fleet from one location

View historic tracking, nautical miles sailed and sea hours analysis enable costs to be more accurately predicted and help improve budgeting and maintenance scheduling.

  • Try it for free

Save time, work more efficiently

A detailed view of individual vessels’ navigational activities and compliance requirements helps you ensure that your vessels are compliant at all times. View information for each individual vessel’s Flag, Class, trading specific and, even, where relevant, SIRE requirements, so you never need be exposed again.

Identify overspend & unlock cost savings

The purchasing and usage of data in Voyager FLEET INSIGHT shows that even the best run fleets significantly overspend on navigation. Identify the ENC and digital publication overspend in your fleet and reduce your cost of navigation.

  • See how much you could save?

View your fleet live on a large screen

In wallboard mode, Voyager FLEET INSIGHT provides continuous display of live vessel positions on large screen in your office. Giving you full visibility of your fleet at all times. This feature is available through out Voyager NAVIGATION as a SERVICE package.

Get help with KPIs

Using Voyager FLEET INSIGHT, managers always know exactly how their vessels are performing

Manage your fleets remotely with VFI Go

VFI Go gives our customers the ability to access fleet tracking, approve orders and access other navigation management tools all via smartphones. Making it as easy as possible to access this information on the go.

  • Get free access to VFI Go

Which package is right for you?

We offer a choice of services from free services to help Marine Managers manage navigational purchasing and compliance and navigation more efficiently. Explore the endless possibilities with our Voyager FLEET INSIGHT packages.

Voyager FLEET INSIGHT Essentials

VFI provides a core sets of tools for managing navigation purchasing and compliance. Free of charge for GNS customers.

Includes:

  • Vessel tracking
  • Subscription management
  • Compliance management
  • PSC inspection histories
  • Order approval and billing history
Get started with VFI Essentials Discover more

Voyager FLEET INSIGHT Navigation Management

VNaaS provides a unique combination of vessel software, online analytics and cost price navigation supplies.

Includes:

  • All VFI Essentials features plus
  • Premium vessel tracking
  • Navigation product usage analysis
  • Historic tracking and sea hours data
  • Port call history
  • Wallboard tool
  • KPI reporting
Get started with VNaaS Get started with VNaaS

Voyager FLEET INSIGHT Plus

VFI Plus includes premium vessel tracking, improves operational oversight and enhanced vessel safety.

Includes:

  • Premium vessel tracking
  • Fleet overview
  • CMAP charts
  • Adjacent vessels
  • Historic tracking and sea hours data
  • Maritime weather
  • Marpol zones
  • Maritime risks
Get started with VFI Plus Discover more
What's included with Voyager FLEET INSIGHT Essentials?

VFI Plus features the ability to view live vessel positions on CMAP charts, overlay current and forecast weather conditions, display MARPOL zones and view all nearby vessels within a user-defined distance.

What's included with Voyager NAVIGATION as a SERVICE (VNaaS) incl. VFY Essentials?

VFI Plus features the ability to view live vessel positions on CMAP charts, overlay current and forecast weather conditions, display MARPOL zones and view all nearby vessels within a user-defined distance.

What's included with Voyager FLEET INSIGHT Plus?

VFI Plus features the ability to view live vessel positions on CMAP charts, overlay current and forecast weather conditions, display MARPOL zones and view all nearby vessels within a user-defined distance.

What's included with Voyager FLEET INSIGHT Essentials?

VFI Plus features the ability to view live vessel positions on CMAP charts, overlay current and forecast weather conditions, display MARPOL zones and view all nearby vessels within a user-defined distance.

What's included with Voyager NAVIGATION as a SERVICE (VNaaS) incl. VFY Essentials?

VFI Plus features the ability to view live vessel positions on CMAP charts, overlay current and forecast weather conditions, display MARPOL zones and view all nearby vessels within a user-defined distance.
